definition: Tutsi, an ethnic group in Rwanda and Burundi
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: The Tutsi have different greetings for morning, afternoon, and evening.
sentences.chinese: 圖西族有上午，下午，和晚上不同的問候。
